title: I Opened The Birdcage Door - Novel Updates
tags: Divorce   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Forced Marriage   Hated Protagonist   Marriage   Second Chance   Unrequited Love
author: AO형
description:
“Let’s divorce.” 
 
Sebastian Hughes was the son-in-law of my family. 

I thought that if I forced him to stay by my side, one day he would come to love me too. 

 But then I realized. 

The only way I could love him was to let him go. 

‘Goodbye, Sebastian.’

I will let you go, from my cage. From my world.

But…

“Let’s start over, Aileen.”

Why are you finally trying to come back to the birdcage?>
